                                                                    More Contact InformationHOUSINGCost OverviewCurrent page:  Academic Year 2021-2022 Cost
                        
    		Academic Year 2021-2022 Cost
    	Room and Board Rates 2021-2022Community and room prices include furnished room/suite, all utilities, and access to Wi-Fi. Meal plans are required, reserved per semester and are added to the total annual cost of the room.Payment Schedule4 payments per semester X 2 = 8 payments a yearThe total cost is divided evenly throughout the year to create the payment schedule. First installment of each semester includes additional $15 Residence Hall Association (RHA) Fee which serves residents by creating a living and learning experience within University-owned residence halls.Installment Due Dates*First installment of each semester includes additional $15 RHA fee.Fall 2021 Semester*7/28/20219/7/202110/6/202111/3/2021Spring 2022 Semester*12/9/20212/9/20223/2/20224/6/2022For specific payment schedule amounts, view the: Printable Room and Board Rates 2021-2022 (PDF)An initial payment of $300 must be paid while applying to reside with University Housing.Fall 2021-2022 Annual Rates for Communities and Rooms*Communities and Room TypesRoom RateMeal Plan RateRHA FeeTotal Annual CostShasta/Lassen/Whitney/Mechoopda/Esken Double Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$8,608.80$3,880.80$30$12,520Whitney Single Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$10,428.00$3,880.80$30$14,339Whitney Small Double Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$7,262.40$3,880.80$30$11,173Whitney Triple Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$7,262.40$3,880.80$30$11,173Whitney Quad Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$5,445.60$3,880.80$30$9,356Konkow Single Room Rate with Mini Meal Plan$10,428.00$1,615.20$30$12,073Konkow Double Room Rate with Mini Meal Plan$8,608.80$1,615.20$30$10,254Konkow Triple Room Rate with Mini Meal Plan$7,262.40$1,615.20$30$8,908Sutter Double Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$9,475.20$3,880.80$30$13,386Sutter Triple Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$7,996.80$3,880.80$30$11,908Sutter Quad Room Rate with Full Meal Plan$5,997.60$3,880.80$30$9,908University Village Single Room Rate with Mini Meal Plan$10,428.00$1,615.20$30$12,073University Village Double Room Rate with Mini Meal Plan$8,608.80$1,615.20$30$10,254Semester Rates for Meal Plans (Required for Residents)Meal Plan Cost per semesterAverage # of MealsFlex CashFull Meal PlansChico Plan: 192 Meals (12 Meals/week)$1,940.40192$64Bidwell Plan: 176 Meals (11 Meals/week)$1,940.40176$128Wildcat Plan: 160 Meals (10 Meals/week)$1,940.40160$192Mini Meal Plan (Konkow and UV Only)Mini Plan: 64 Meals (4 Meals/week)$807.6064$112Meal Plan Assignments
                        Shasta, Lassen, Sutter, Esken or Mechoopda

                    Mini Meal Plan
You will automatically receive the Mini Meal Plan, but can opt for a full plan (Chico, Bidwell, or Wildcat) if desired.Vice President for Student AffairsKendall Hall, Room 110530-898-6131www.csuchico.edu/saDivision of Student AffairsAccessibility Resource CenterAssociated StudentsBasic Needs ProjectCareer CenterEquity, Diversity & InclusionEarly Outreach & Support ProgramsEnrollment Management ServicesFinancial Aid & ScholarshipsIntercollegiate AthleticsOff-Campus Student ServicesStudent Conduct, Rights & ResponsibilitiesStudent Life & LeadershipUniversity HousingWellCat Services
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
